title: Twisted Treeline suggestion
body:
Hello @RiotGames

It would be of best interest to allow players that are playing the Twisted Treeline game mode to surrender the match @10 minutes and not @15. Just played a game that was over after the 5 minute mark due to me being bad at league.  I had to sit around and get killed over and over again while the enemy team trashed talked the whole game. It was not a very fun experience and has made me never want to play League of legends again.

Yours Truly- Rompi

replies.body:
Dear Riot The Big Yikes,

It's sad too see that you think games aren't over by the 5 minute mark but you fail to understand that when there is an {{champion:84}} in the game it is over by Champ Select. I hope this message is sent over to the balance team to fix this bug.

Sincerely,
Rompi

1- You can type "/mute all" in chat.
2- Anyone who surrenders should have never queued up in the first place if they don't want to play. Stop wasting people's time.
